meanings.sent1: My ami and I enjoy playing games together.
meanings.sent2: She is my closest ami and we share everything.
meanings.sent3: I asked my ami to help me with a tricky puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her cheerful nature makes her an ami to everyone she meets.
meanings.sent5: Having a loyal ami by your side can make life more enjoyable.

meanings.sent1: My ami and I went fishing last weekend.
meanings.sent2: He is a reliable ami who always has my back.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly called my male cat my ami.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the hero's loyal ami helped him through tough times.
meanings.sent5: Having a trustworthy male ami can make adventures more fun.
